CustomField.description: The value in this field will be "Inside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [NEP Close] is < TODAY AND [Sent to medical underwriting] is blank AND NOW() is less than or equal to the [100% Onboarding Date Time] The value in this field will be "Outside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [NEP Close] is < TODAY AND [Sent to medical underwriting] is blank AND NOW() is greater than the [100% Onboarding Date Time]
CustomField.formula: IF( NEP_Close__c < TODAY() && ISBLANK(Sent_to_Medical_Underwriting__c ) && (NOW() <= X100_Onboarding_Date_Time__c ), "Inside SLA", IF(NEP_Close__c < TODAY() && ISBLANK(Sent_to_Medical_Underwriting__c ) && (NOW() > X100_Onboarding_Date_Time__c), "Outside SLA", "") )
CustomField.label: Sent to Med UW (W) SLA
